page.title: 09Little Ayton.
page.content: Little Ayton is a small community about a mile away from Great Ayton. Known by quite a lot of people, who pass by when going to{Rosberry Topping for walks. Little Ayton is much smaller than neighbouring Great Ayton. Most people like Little Ayton for it has lots of fresh air, nice long walks and the people are friendly. The{Old Farmhouse}in Little Ayton, stands next to the stables. The only thing that has changed on the Old Farmhouse is that the roof has had to be repaired, and two new chimmneys have had to be added. {Mrs Watson}(who lives in Little Ayton) said "I like Little Ayton because of the countryside and because,everybody is so friendly". {Tom Barron}who also lives at Little Ayton said "I have no intentions of moving as I like it here very much."
